title: Lecture: Altered States—The Conservation of the "Ayala Altarpiece"
hero_caption: <p>&nbsp;Spanish. <em>Retable and Frontal of the Life of Christ and the Virgin Made for Pedro López de Ayala</em>, 1396. Gift of Charles Deering.</p>
description:
Join us to learn about the dramatic transformation of a 14th century Spanish Altarpiece. In this lecture, Julie Simek, Associate Paintings Conservator, describes the fascinating discoveries she and her collaborators made during the 3-year conservation study and treatment.

This program is presented with American Sign Language interpretation.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.
